entity.name: Buster Neece
entity.description: A senior web applications developer with a special interest in streaming media and accessibility in technology. Creator and lead maintainer of the AzuraCast web radio management suite.

projects.name: AzuraCast
projects.description: AzuraCast is a "web radio station in a box", a fully self-contained suite of fully free and open-source software that lets you broadcast an Internet radio station with flexibility and ease. AzuraCast includes a web UI where you can manage your station's media and streamers, view reports and analytics, and even DJ directly from your browser.
